title: Mike Ostrowski
summary: Michael Ostrowski is an American television producer and screenwriter, best known for his work on serial drama Jericho and CSI spin-off CSI: Miami, both of which he has worked on as a producer and screenwriter. He currently serves as co-executive producer on NBC's The Blacklist.As a producer, he has worked on the series Jericho, E-Ring and CSI: Miami, serving as supervising producer, producer and co-producer respectively. His writing credits are again for CSI: Miami and Jericho, and also for Private Practice and The District.
